channel.title: Need help using BMS's animated backround
channel.description: I'm looking to use the animated background used in the start menu as a animated desktop wallpaper using DreamScene 7. Ive looked at tutorials to do this in other source games but i cant seem to find them in the BMS/media folder. are they stored in a different folder or am i doing something wrong?

item.description:

item.title: Need help using BMS's animated backround
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I’m assuming you mean the animation that plays behind the menus, like this.

If so, these are actual maps, not media. I don’t know how to get these to display as an animated wallpaper for Windows, but you can find these maps in Steam/steamapps/sourcemods/BMS/maps, they’re the ones with “background” in the file name.
